title: Two Sigma's Approach to Impact Investing in Workforce Development
description: Warren Valdmanis, partner at Two Sigma Impact, speaks with Penta senior writer Abby Schultz about why companies should focus more on creating good jobs and how to do it.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Warren Valdmanis, partner at Two Sigma Impact, speaks with Penta senior writer Abby Schultz about why companies should focus more on creating good jobs and how to do it.
